level.heading: REPORTING REQUIREMENTS FOR THE DC USTF ADMINISTRATOR (ยง 15-2813)

level.text: On a quarterly basis, the Fund Administrator shall submit to the Commission a report including:
A statement of collections and distributions from the universal service fund for each local exchange carrier and VoIP service provider;
A statement detailing the purpose for which the universal service funds were used (to support an enumerated service listed in ยง 2802.1 or for verification of lifeline eligibility); and
A record of total cost of universal service fund administration.
On September 30 every year after the establishment of the DC USTF, the Fund Administrator shall submit to the Commission a report that includes a proposed budget for the upcoming year.
